Package com.cedro.musicplayer

package com.cedro.musicplayer
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AllTracksTrackListView
    Class representing the ListView control for the "All tracks" page in the library
    CollectionTrackListView
    Class representing the ListView control displayed when opening albums and user collections.
    Jukebox
    Singleton class responsible for playing and keeping track of the state of currenty played music.
    LibraryCollectionTile
    Class representing a collection tile with a cover and a name displayed in "Albums" and "User collections" sections
    LibraryCollectionTileContextMenu
    Class representing the context menu for the library collection tile.
    LibraryModelController
    A class representing the library page of the application.
    Localization
    Small utility class used to retrieve localised strings
    MusicAlbum
    A class representing a music album.
    MusicCollection
    Class representing a collection of music tracks.
    MusicDatabase
    A class that stores all tracks, albums and user collections
    MusicPlayerApplication
    Main application class
    MusicTrack
    Class representing a music track
    PlayerHud
    Class representing the main player view with the track timeline, play/pause button etc.
    PlayerHudAndTrackList
    Class for a component that holds playlist ListView and player HUD.
    PlaylistTrackListView
    ListView class for the paylist
    RootController
    Controller class for the root view
    TrackListContextMenu
    ContextMenu class for the track list view.
    TrackListView
    Abstract class for the ListView that displays music tracks.
